title: Set alias for columns in dataset but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder and double-clicking on the first column name, the original column name is displayed instead of the alias name.
EB: According to scr 78193 in tracker, the first column in the expression builder should display the alias name instead of the original name.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder. 
2. Select the dataset. 
3. Double-click on the first column name. 
Expected result: The alias name of the first column should be displayed in the expression builder. 
Actual result: The original name of the first column is displayed below the expression builder, but the alias name appears as 'row["column1"]' after double-clicking the original name.
